## NumericFieldScaleBinding interface

Describes the parameters to map a data field onto a numeric scale.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface NumericFieldScaleBinding extends DataFieldBinding 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [DataFieldBinding](./schema.datafieldbinding.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [domain?](./schema.numericfieldscalebinding.domain.md) |  | \[number, number\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Domain of the input data (e.g., min/max values). |
|  [range?](./schema.numericfieldscalebinding.range.md) |  | \[number, number\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Output range to map to (e.g., min/max pixels on the display). |
